ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sand and hill giants are L30-35.  Seafuries are L40+ (and can t be charmed by bards). ... Normal cyclopses are L25-28.  I could almost solo one in my low
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
>
> Heh actually giants are harder then sea furies. There is a little unknown

Sand and hill giants are L30-35. Seafuries are L40+ (and
can't be charmed by bards).

> fact about them but sinced they nerfed the exp I guess I can let it out.
> Sea furies are just cyclops with a new name. At first they dropped the same
> words a normal cyclops did. Verant forgot to upgrade the ac and attack
> rating heh.

Normal cyclopses are L25-28. I could almost solo one in my
low 30s. Unless they've been nerfed lately, the seafuries
could eat me alive even at 40. My friends and I fought them
for about 2 hours at 40-45 (4 tanks, cleric, and bard) and
they took so long to kill we decided it wasn't worth the
experience.

> P.S. Why repond to this but skip over my test report post?

Frankly? I've never found your numerical comments to be
accurate or concise enough for me to consider them reliable.
(That's not to say you don't contribute - you provide insight
from the L50 viewpoint. But you're like a fishing buddy I
have. He knows a lot about fishing technique and style, but I
don't believe anything he says with numbers in it. He's just
not a numbers kind of guy.)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
